content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Pipes connecting the steam engine and boiler to the offshore pump

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using undefined functions
- Ensure that all functions used in the code are defined and correctly referenced. In this case, 'shift_entity' is not defined.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the position where you want to place a new entity is valid and not occupied by another entity. The error indicates that the new steam engine could not be placed at the desired position.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Check the positions of the entities you are trying to connect with pipes. Ensure that the connection points are valid and that there are no obstructions preventing the connection. The error indicates a failure to connect the pipe from the offshore pump to the steam engine.
